description: The MODIS Level 3 monthly product provides sea surface temperature (SST) at 4.6 km spatial resolutionsover the global oceans derived from the NASA MODIS sensor on board the Aqua satellite. This gridded product has been generated from daily Level 2 product consisting of global day and night coverage every 24 hours.
name: Nigeria AOI (SST): MODIS/Aqua Level 3 Global Ocean Mapped 4 KM Daily Ocean Color Products - JANUARY
